summary: This document appears to be an email or message from an unidentified sender to Brad Edwards, expressing sadness and disappointment that Edwards, along with Stan, Sigrid, and David, have focused the entire sex trafficking case on Prince Andrew, allegedly silencing other victims. The sender accuses them of hypocrisy and claims only the sender and Prince Andrew's voices matter.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Addressed directly in an emotional message criticizing the focus of the sex trafficking case on Prince Andrew, implying he is a key legal figure involved.

events.title: Sender's Emotional Accusation
events.description: An unidentified sender emails Brad Edwards expressing sadness and disappointment, accusing him and others of focusing the sex trafficking case solely on Prince Andrew and silencing other voices.

keyFacts: An unidentified individual sent a message to Brad Edwards on January 28, 2023, expressing deep sadness and disappointment.
The sender accuses Brad Edwards, Stan, Sigrid, and David of making the entire sex trafficking case about Prince Andrew, thereby 'destroying us all' and silencing other voices.
The sender claims that only the sender and Prince Andrew are the 'only two people who count' in the matter.
The message includes the subject line 'Hypocrites, Rapists and Murderers!' indicating strong accusatory language.
The correspondence suggests internal conflict or dissatisfaction among individuals associated with the case regarding its focus and representation.
